Posts.Content: Jan 22, 2008 04:09PM Mommah wrote: I'm sorry purple but I would not change that appt. I am in Ireand and the law is pretty similar. you are entitled to time off for doctors appts etc. You are not asking for annual leave. Worst case scenario I would take the time and bring a sick note from your surgeon...nothing they can do. I personally would scream from the rooftops "I have breast cancer" (even though hopefully you don't) I have a lump in my right breast and have had a clear mammo/ultrasound and biopsy...so good luck!
Posts.Title: very very scared! purplequeen purplequeen
